price: 96. Derejooyin (sare) oo Xaggiisa ah, iyo denbi dhaaf iyo Naxariiis. Allena waa Denbi Dhaaf Badane, Naxariis Badan.
arabic: دَرَجَٰتٖ مِّنۡهُ وَمَغۡفِرَةٗ وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: darajātin min'hu wamaghfiratan waraḥmatan wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
